issue.title: [C++][Doc] Undocumented parameter in Dataset namespace
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8583](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8583). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See build log: https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/branches/all?query=nightly-2020-04-24-0-circle-test-ubuntu-18.04-docs

We should build the doxygen docs on each commit, preferably in the conda-cpp build.
